verses.name: Genesis 8:5
verses.text: And the waters decreased continually until the tenth month: in the tenth month, on the first day of the month, were the tops of the mountains seen.

verses.name: Genesis 8:6
verses.text: And it came to pass at the end of forty days, that Noah opened the window of the ark which he had made:

verses.name: Genesis 8:7
verses.text: And he sent forth a raven, which went forth to and fro, until the waters were dried up from off the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 8:8
verses.text: Also he sent forth a dove from him, to see if the waters were abated from off the face of the ground;
